transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji aap Piyush ji Shanwaz bol rahe ho?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Sir woh wohi aapka aapne check vagera agar kar liya toh sir ticket close karni hai.
Executive: Teen din se open hai sir. Haan ticket close kar do abhi.
Executive: Haan haan aapne check kaise kar liya tha Piyush ji?
Customer: Haan kiya hai. Main abhi office se hi hu nahi isliye do din bahar hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha bahar nikal gaye aap Piyush ji.
Executive: Aise maine dekhi Piyush ji woh sare jitna bhi maine ek ek check kar liya tha ho maine select kar diya tha uske baad parso hi kiya tha maine uske baad kal bhi maine open karke dekha tha aapka ki kisi ka category fir se wapas toh nahi hat gaya hai toh kal bhi maine pura ek baar profile dekha aapka toh ek bhi abhi tak nahi hata hai main aaj bhi ek baar check kar lunga sir uske baad hi close karunga theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir, thank you.
Executive: Haan haan aur baki aap jab do din ke baad free ho jayenge toh aap call kar lijiyega sir.
Customer: Okay sir, thank you.
Executive: Toh uss time pe hum log aaram se discuss kar lenge jo bhi aur bhi agar kuch problems vagera hai toh uss pe aaram se discuss kar lenge.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Abhi main aapki pehle check kar leta hu uske baad ticket close karta hu sir apne side se theek hai?
Customer: Check karke aap ticket close kar dena.
Executive: Kya bol rahe ho sir?
Customer: Aap check karke ticket close kar dena main aisa bata raha hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Abhi nikal jana aisa bata raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai abhi main woh nahi isliye toh dekhna padega sab par aise toh hoga nahi abhi.
Customer: Do din aise hi chala jayenge.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai aap mere ko agar call karke bhi sir agar bataoge ki Shanwaz ji mere ko yeh yeh cheeze problem aa rahi toh bhi mere ko hi kaam karna hai sir.
Executive: Aur aap ticket bhi open kijiyega toh bhi mere ko hi kaam karna hai sir toh aap directly call kijiye maine aapse kabhi mana nahi kiya sir aur aap bhi dekhte ho aap call karte ho toh main response karta hu jo bhi cheeze delivered bhi karta hu sir.
Executive: Toh ticket open karne pe bhi main hi representative hu change toh nahi ho jayega sir.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Aur main support karunga koi dikkat nahi hai sir uske liye mere ko
Executive: ek aaj aur Sunday Saturday aur Sunday band hai office.
Customer: Toh fir?
Executive: Toh fir bhi main kaam agar jaise aapki profile thi toh check kar karke kaam vagera mein sir main apna best deliver kar.
Executive: agar Monday ko bhi aapko agar kuch issues vagera lag rahi ho.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants the ticket to be closed.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check and close ticket.
- Executive offered direct call for issues.



Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, profile, check
